scripts.install-both: concurrently "cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt" "cd frontend && pnpm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && uvicorn index:app --reload " "cd frontend && pnpm dev"
scripts.dev:80: concurrently "cd backend && uvicorn index:app --reload " "cd frontend && pnpm dev:80"
scripts.dev-backend-micro: run 3 micro services concurrently AND nginx
